title: orange essence
body:
i got a project yasou like a month ago and i disenchant it but now i have only 1011/1050
also i have 20 rp that i never used
so i was asking if i can replace them or ask riot for essence (would be great :D ) or any way to get the essence cuz next chest is 4days
thanks in advance ^_^

replies.body: I can't give out Orange Essence since it's relatively easy to get by just playing the game, but maybe we can figure this out with some RP Gift Art ^_^! Shoot me a quick drawing ooooooof....hmmmm....let's say a Yasuo Inspired Poro and I can help you out a bit with getting another chest at least if you want!
No deadline! I'll be sure to check back for your response, and I'll get notified as long as you reply to one of my comments here ^_^!

Sorry for the slow response fam, caught me while I wasn't at work is all!

Oh man that is one beautiful poro ^_^. Seriously that hair is on point xD!!

Be sure to double check your RP! You should have enough for a chest now ^_^

i am done{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 
where to upload ? ^_^
